programme.desc: Dean et Cindy se sont aimés dès qu'ils se sont vus. La jeune femme vivait alors une relation tumultueuse avec Bobby, son petit ami de l'époque. Dean a su la séduire et la réconforter. Des années plus tard, leur couple bat sérieusement de l'aile. Dean n'est plus que l'ombre de lui-même. Sa femme, qui le tenait en haute estime, se désole de son manque d'ambition au point qu'elle ne supporte plus sa présence.

programme.title: Thalasso
programme.desc: Cinq ans après avoir été kidnappé, l'écrivain Michel Houellebecq doit prendre soin de sa santé vacillante après trop d'excès de boisson et se rend dans un centre de thalassothérapie. Les soins, l'interdiction de fumer et le régime sans alcool obligatoires ne l'enchantent guère. Tout comme l'acteur Gérard Depardieu, patient également, et avec lequel il se lie d'amitié. Ensemble, ils boivent en cachette, se racontent des choses intimes et parlent religion, philosophie et politique. Leur séjour est chamboulé quand des amis de l'écrivain lui demandent un service.

programme.title: Succession

programme.title: Cessez-le-feu
programme.desc: En 1916, à Arcole, le capitaine Georges Laffont fait partie des soldats français fortement éprouvés par la guerre. En 1920, Hélène, qui enseigne le langage des signes, s'occupe notamment de Marcel, le frère de Georges, muet depuis son expérience sur le front. Georges, lui, a fuit la France pour refaire sa vie en Afrique, où il mène, en compagnie de son fidèle traducteur et aide de camp Diofo, une existence d'aventurier. Un jour, contraint de rentrer en France, Georges revient chez lui et retrouve Marcel et leur mère. Il fait également la connaissance d'Hélène.

programme.title: Le dernier gang
programme.desc: Au milieu des années 1970, Simon et ses copains, tous nés à Belleville, à Paris, dévalisent au culot de modestes agences bancaires. Quelques ratés et succès plus tard, ils basculent dans le grand banditisme et se font connaître sous le nom du Gang des postiches. C'est lors d'un braquage que Simon remarque Julie, dont il tombe amoureux. Eprise également, cette dernière accepte de partager sa vie.

programme.title: Ramdam
programme.desc: Amine, brillant professeur d'histoire des civilisations, à Bordeaux, est courtisé par une université de Boston. Mais avant de partir aux Etats-Unis avec sa femme et ses enfants, il veut régler la vente d'une maison de famille à Saint-Marsain, village où réside son papa Rachid, président du club de rugby local. Les deux hommes ont des relations conflictuelles. Amine est furieux lorsqu'il découvre que son père a acheté les murs de la petite mosquée afin de transformer le lieu en discothèque pour fêter les fins de match.

programme.title: Dévoilées
programme.desc: En 1970, Isabelle Sauser, 24 ans, vient d'accompagner son mari Laurent à l'aéroport lorsqu'elle apprend, deux heures plus tard, que l'avion de celui-ci vient de s'écraser. En 2018, Isabelle vit avec sa petite-fille de 21 ans, Anaïs, en Suisse. Un jour, elle l'aperçoit dans un train, entièrement voilée. Sans oser en parler à Anaïs, elle prévient aussitôt Léa. Laquelle saute dans un avion pour tenter de comprendre la conversion de sa fille, en pleine radicalisation. Si Isabelle refuse de confronter Anaïs à sa découverte par crainte de la faire fuir, cette conversion fait resurgir les fantômes de son passé.

programme.title: My Dinner with Hervé
programme.desc: Le journaliste Danny Tate est envoyé à Los Angeles par son rédacteur en chef pour réaliser une interview du comédien en disgrâce Hervé Villechaize. L'acteur lui propose de le suivre lors d'une virée nocturne à travers Los Angeles.

programme.title: Narco
programme.desc: Gustave Klopp, surnommé "Gus", s'endort n'importe où et n'importe quand. Un handicap qui l'empêche de travailler. Son épouse Pam, qui tient un institut de beauté, ne supporte plus de le voir traîner avec son meilleur ami Lenny Bar. Gus décide alors d'entamer une thérapie de groupe. Son psy Samuel Pupkin découvre alors que Gus fait des rêves incroyables où il devient un superhéros invincible et vengeur.

programme.title: Suicide Tourist
programme.desc: Le 10 janvier 2019, Max Isaksen, détective pour une compagnie d'assurances, enregistre une courte vidéo au cours de laquelle il affirme qu'il va mettre fin à sa vie. L'homme s'est inscrit au registre de l'hôtel Aurora, un établissement qui propose confidentiellement des solutions de suicide assisté à ses hôtes. Il rencontre rapidement Karen, une des membres du personnel, qui lui demande de se séparer de son téléphone portable avant de lui faire signer une décharge. Tous deux s'envolent ensuite pour une destination inconnue de Max.

programme.title: Cowboys
programme.desc: Un soir, Josie, surnommée Joe, révèle à son père Troy qu'elle n'est pas seulement le garçon manqué qu'il croyait, mais un véritable garçon enfermé dans un corps de fille de 11 ans. Si Troy, désemparé, comprend son enfant, sa femme Sally n'accepte pas le changement d'identité de sa fille. Un matin, Troy, séparé de sa femme, part sans avertissement avec Joe en randonnée dans les montagnes sauvages du Montana. Les deux veulent expérimenter la vie à la belle étoile des cowboys d'autrefois. Croyant à un kidnapping de la part de Troy, Sally alerte la police.

programme.title: Les saveurs du succès
programme.desc: Carsten et Maggi, parents de deux adorables enfants, mène une vie de rêve. Le couple, passionné, dirige avec brio le Malus, un restaurant très sophistiqué de Copenhague. Tandis que Maggi compose savamment l'atmosphère de l'établissement, Carsten, chef perfectionniste jusqu'à l'obsession, n'attend fébrilement qu'une chose : la visite d'un inspecteur qui leur permettra enfin de remporter la première étoile du Guide Michelin. Alors que la pression est considérable, une lettre anonyme; destinée à Carsten, est déposée au restaurant. Celle-ci affirme que Maggi est amoureuse d'un autre homme.

programme.title: True Blood
True Blood
programme.desc: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756","dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara, Evie, Roxanne, Amy et Birdie suivent les conseils de Rae pour mettre au point un plan solide pour s'emparer d'un collier qui vaut près de 16 millions de dollars.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Evie et ses comparses découvrent qu'elles ont finalement été doublées, un mystérieux voleur s'est emparé du collier. En outre, la police est sur leurs traces.

programme.title: Man on Fire
programme.desc: Mexico est depuis six jours le théâtre d'enlèvements d'enfants de parents fortunés. L'industriel Samuel Ramos et sa femme Lisa engagent alors John Creasy, ancien agent de la CIA, pour assurer la protection rapprochée de Pita, leur fillette de 9 ans. Creasy tolère à peine cet enfant précoce, qui ne cesse de l'interroger sur sa vie. Mais, peu à peu, il apprend à l'apprécier. Pita est enlevée. Creasy se lance dans une vendetta.

programme.title: Life in a Year
programme.desc: Daryn est à une année charnière de sa vie. Très surveillé par son père Xavier, le jeune homme, en dernière année de lycée, se concentre sur ses études et candidate à Harvard. C'est en se rendant à un concert avec ses meilleurs amis Sammy et Kiran qu'il fait la connaissance d'Isabelle, très libre, en tout point différente de lui. Alors que Daryn est immédiatement séduit par Isabelle, la jeune femme, qui a plus conscience de ce qui les sépare, se montre plutôt distante. Pourtant, à force d'obstination, Daryn parvient à se rapprocher d'elle.

programme.title: Rango
programme.desc: Caméléon domestique, Rango est tout sauf aventurier. Le hasard lui joue un mauvais tour et il se retrouve perdu au beau milieu du désert. Après avoir échappé de peu à un aigle, il fait la connaissance de Fève, une femelle lézard. Celle-ci vient d'une petite ville du Far West, Poussière, où elle emmène son nouvel ami. Rango décide de s'y faire passer pour un héros et impressionne les habitants, bien aidé par un heureux concours de circonstances. John, la vieille tortue maire du village, le nomme alors shérif. Il doit enquêter sur la pénurie d'eau qui assèche la ville.

programme.title: Toute ressemblance...
programme.desc: Alors que, traversant une mauvaise passe, il est poursuivi par des paparazzi sous le pont de l'Alma, Cédric Saint Guérande, le plus célèbre présentateur de journal télévisé de France, repense à ses débuts, 18 ans plus tôt, quand le fade Jean-Charles Balin tenait son poste et que Cédric travaillait dans on ombre. Il se souvient du moment où son destin bascule, le 11 septembre 2001, quand il se retrouve à la place de Balin devant les caméras pour présenter le journal télévisé. Pour Cédric, c'est le début d'une irrésistible ascension.

programme.title: American Gangster
programme.desc: Dans le quartier de Harlem, à New York, en 1970, à la mort du caïd local dont il était le chauffeur et confident depuis quinze ans, Frank Lucas décide de prendre la relève. Jeune, ambitieux et intelligent, il ne veut dépendre de personne et met son propre réseau sur pied. Utilisant les avions de l'armée américaine, il importe des quantités massives d'héroïne et amasse rapidement une fortune colossale.

programme.title: Sécurité rapprochée
programme.desc: Employé de la CIA, Matt Weston est chargé de surveiller un des locaux secrets de l'agence au Cap, en Afrique du Sud. Lassé du peu d'intérêt de sa mission, il aspire à plus de responsabilités. Au même moment, Tobin Frost, ex-agent accusé de vendre des renseignements confidentiels, est arrêté non loin de là. Il est conduit dans la planque que surveille Matt. Bientôt, un commando armé prend le local d’assaut.

programme.title: Marie Stuart, reine d'Ecosse
programme.desc: Dans la seconde moitié du XVIe siècle, Marie Stuart, née catholique et encore enfant, est envoyée en France alors que les protestants se battent pour le contrôle de l'Ecosse. A 15 ans, elle épouse l'héritier du trône de France. A 18 ans, veuve, elle rentre dans une Ecosse dominée par les protestants et gouvernée par son demi-frère, le comte de Moray. Elisabeth est la reine protestante de l'Angleterre et Marie, qui peut légitimement prétendre au trône de par sa naissance, constitue une menace pour la reine.

programme.title: Argo
programme.desc: En 1979, lors de la prise de l'ambassade américaine à Téhéran par les révolutionnaires iraniens, soixante Américains sont pris en otage. Mais, au beau lieu du chaos, six employés parviennent à s'échapper. Ils se réfugient au domicile de l'ambassadeur canadien. Tony Mendez, agent de la CIA spécialiste de l'exfiltration, tente de trouver un plan pour les sauver. Il a l'idée de faire passer les employés pour des techniciens de cinéma venus en repérage en Iran pour tourner un film de science-fiction. Ce thriller dramatique est inspiré de faits vécus.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila a désobéi et mis en place, en secret, un autre protocole thérapeutique pour Gudz. Le patient réagit mal au traitement, il est en danger de mort imminente. Sheila appelle Jimmy à la rescousse. Elle va devoir avouer à Elizabeth qu'elle n'a pas choqué son patient. Pour lui changer les idées, Baya l'entraine dans une très confidentielle soirée "d'astreinte", dans les caves de l'hôpital..

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: L'homme au chat est passé à l'acte et assassiné son voisin. Se sentant coupable, Sheila décide d'agir et de ne plus obéir aux ordres de sa hiérarchie.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Sheila, Jimmy prennent la direction du Paradis, une petit bourgade où les grands-parents du jeune homme tiennent du maison d'hôtes.

programme.title: HP
programme.desc: Dans la maison d'hôtes, Sheila doit faire face à la tentative de suicide de Gudz. Cet acte permet à Jimmy de comprendre l'origine de son propre trauma.

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E1 On ne choisit pas sa famille

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E2 Maman, 12 appels manqués, 6 mémos, 3 textos

programme.title: Un heureux événement
programme.desc: Etudiante en philosophie, Barbara Dray fait la connaissance de Nicolas Malle, qui travaille dans un vidéoclub. Il parvient à la séduire et ils s'installent ensemble. Lors de vacances, Nicolas convainc Barbara de faire un bébé. Un jour, la jeune femme annonce à Nicolas qu'elle est enceinte. Pendant sa grossesse, Barbara passe par tous les états. Et vient enfin le jour de l'accouchement, qui se déroule sans encombre. Mais c'est le début d'une véritable détresse pour Barbara, qui ne parvient pas à se faire à cette nouvelle vie.

programme.title: Story Movies
programme.desc: Sophie Soulignac rencontre Josiane Balasko à l'affiche de "La pièce rapportée. Théo Christine et Sandor Funtek partagent leurs souvenirs sur le tournage de "Suprêmes". Enfin Audrey Diwan nous parle de son film "L'événement". Elle est accompagnée de sa jeune actrice Anamaria Vartolomei.

programme.title: Pitch Perfect 3
programme.desc: Les Bellas, une chorale a cappella de filles, viennent d'obtenir leur diplôme et rêvent d'un avenir prometteur, plein de belles opportunités. Mais les offres de travail sont peu nombreuses. Lors d'une soirée, Aubrey, la fille d'un militaire haut placé, parle aux autres membres du groupe d'un concert organisé en Espagne en soutien aux forces armées américaines. Sur place, les Bellas découvrent rapidement qu'elles sont en compétition avec trois autres formations musicales pour assurer la première partie de DJ Khaled lors de sa future tournée en Europe.

programme.title: Dans Paris
programme.desc: Paul, 30 ans, rompt avec Anna et retourne quelques jours chez son père pour passer ce cap difficile. Son frère Jonathan, jeune homme insouciant, encore étudiant, tente de le sortir de sa déprime. Au cours d'une seule journée ponctuée de diverses rencontres, la famille, y compris la mère qui avait quitté son mari depuis plusieurs années, va se ressouder pour aider Paul à oublier ses pensées suicidaires.

programme.title: Fini de jouer
programme.desc: A 32 ans, Abe Applebaum n'est plus que l'ombre de ce qu'il a été. Détective prodige dès l'âge de 13 ans, le jeune homme a connu une certaine notoriété avant de déchoir sévèrement. Désormais légèrement alcoolique, Abe, 32 ans, vit toujours dans la ville pavillonnaire de Willowbrook, sous le regard navré de ses parents et en est réduit à traiter des affaires mineures, souvent très mal rémunérées. Tout change quand Caroline, une de ses anciennes clientes, vient le voir pour l'aider à résoudre le meurtre de son petit ami, tué de 17 coups de couteaux.

programme.title: Fugazi
programme.desc: Depuis plus de trois ans, Adèle travaille sur ORBIT, une station spatiale chargée du pilotage des drones sur la planète Terre. Aujourd'hui, tenant entre ses mains deux joysticks, il ne lui reste plus qu'une mission de routine à accomplir pour rejoindre enfin sa famille. A moins qu'un grain de sable ne fasse basculer son destin..

programme.title: Music
programme.desc: Atteinte de troubles autistiques, la jeune Music vit avec sa grand-mère. S’échappant dans un monde de rêve, Music mène par ailleurs une existence pleine de rituels. Un jour, sa grand-mère meurt. La jeune fille est alors confiée à sa demi-soeur, Zu, une toxicomane récemment sortie de cure. Cette dernière ne sait pas bien comment s’y prendre et commet des maladresses. Lors d’une crise de Music, Ebo, un voisin, propose son aide à Zu. il sait comment calmer l’adolescente. Et Zu trouve un livre laissé par sa grand-mère qui détaille la routine quotidienne de Music.

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E1 On ne choisit pas sa famille

programme.title: Hashtag Boomer
programme.sub-title: S1 E2 Maman, 12 appels manqués, 6 mémos, 3 textos

programme.title: American Pie
programme.desc: Jim, Oz, Kevin et Finch, quatre copains, décident de perdre leur virginité avant de commencer la fac. Chacun a sa méthode. Jim jette son dévolu sur Nadia, tandis qu'Oz entre dans la chorale pour séduire la prude Heather. Kevin veut convaincre sa petite amie Vicky au moyen d'une «bible» sur les plaisirs du sexe. Finch se fait passer pour un «supermâle». Toutes les filles veulent alors être sa cavalière au bal de la promo.

programme.title: American Pie 2
programme.desc: Jim, Oz, Kevin et Finch, quatre jeunes amis, entendent profiter dignement de leurs vacances. Ils louent une maison sur le bord du lac Michigan. Alors que Nadia doit rejoindre Jim à la fin de l'été, ce dernier retrouve Michelle, une flûtiste délurée auprès de laquelle il a beaucoup de choses à apprendre. Quant à Finch, il se prépare à une nouvelle rencontre avec la mère de Stiffler.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Sara, Evie, Roxanne, Amy et Birdie suivent les conseils de Rae pour mettre au point un plan solide pour s'emparer d'un collier qui vaut près de 16 millions de dollars.

programme.title: The Unusual Suspects
programme.desc: Evie et ses comparses découvrent qu'elles ont finalement été doublées, un mystérieux voleur s'est emparé du collier. En outre, la police est sur leurs traces.

programme.title: American Pie : marions-les !
programme.desc: Sous le regard aimant de son papa, Jim s'est décidé à demander Michelle en mariage. Ravi que celle-ci ait accepté, il souhaite lui organiser une fête inoubliable. Mais le chemin jusqu'à l'autel s'annonce semé d'embuches pour le jeune homme. Entre son enterrement de vie de garçon avec ses amis illuminés, la présentation des deux familles et la pression du jour J, il va en voir de toutes les couleurs.

programme.title: American Pie 4
programme.desc: Treize ans après leur diplôme, Jim et ses amis ont bien changé. Le jeune homme est aujourd'hui marié avec Michelle. Ils ont un petit garçon et des obligations qui nuisent à leur vie sexuelle. Oz et Kevin sont également en couple alors que Finch cherche toujours le grand amour. Tous se réunissent le temps d'un week-end pour participer à une réunion d'anciens du lycée. Évidemment, l'encombrant Stifler ne tarde pas à débarquer.

programme.title: L'ivresse du pouvoir
programme.desc: Jeanne Charmant-Killman, juge à Paris, instruit une délicate affaire touchant aux milieux politiques et industriels. D'emblée, elle fait incarcérer pour détournement de fonds Michel Humeau, le président d'un puissant groupe industriel public qu’elle commence à interroger avec acharnement. Comme les autres personnes impliquées, Humeau reste muet. Jeanne se voit adjoindre une seconde magistrate avec qui elle travaille en bonne intelligence. Bientôt, les pressions pour la stopper vont s'intensifiant. Jeanne, incorruptible, se sent de plus en plus menacée.

programme.title: Shock Wave 2
programme.desc: Poon Shing Fung et Tung Cheuk Man, deux brillants officiers artificiers de la police de Hongkong, sont appelés sur de périlleuses opérations de déminage. A cours de l'une d'entre elles, Shing Fung se trouve pris dans le feu d'une violente explosion, le laissant amputé d'une jambe. Désormais aidé d'une prothèse et déterminé à retrouver sa mobilité, Poon suit un programme sportif intensif, mais quitte la police. Cinq ans plus tard, un jeune homme muni d'une ceinture d'explosif commet un attentat meurtrier dans un immeuble de la ville. Selon toute vraisemblance, il appartient à un mouvement terroriste.

programme.title: Austin Powers
programme.desc: En 1967, à Londres, Austin Powers est un photographe de mode adulé des femmes et jalousé des hommes. Plus discrètement, il est aussi le meilleur agent secret au service de Sa Majesté. Un soir, son ennemi juré, le diabolique docteur Denfer, parvient à lui échapper à bord d'une fusée spatiale et ne trouve rien de mieux à faire que de se congeler. Son but ? Revenir terroriser le monde trente ans plus tard. Austin Powers décide d'en faire de même. En 1997, les deux adversaires reviennent à la vie et s'affrontent à nouveau dans un monde qui a beaucoup changé.

programme.title: Driver
programme.desc: Alors qu'elle sort d'un casino, une joueuse est témoin de la fuite de deux gangsters poursuivis par la police. Grâce à la virtuosité du chauffeur, les malfrats parviennent à s'enfuir.

programme.title: On ne meurt que deux fois
programme.desc: Le cadavre de Charles Berliner, un pianiste célèbre, est retrouvé dans la neige près d'une voie ferrée. Le commissaire Bauman charge l'inspecteur Robert Staniland de résoudre l'affaire au plus vite. Celui-ci trouve au domicile du défunt une série d'enregistrements audio où Berliner évoque sa passion pour une certaine Barbara. Quand cette dernière fait irruption dans l'appartement où le pianiste s'était installé, elle avoue à l'inspecteur être la coupable qu'il recherche. Bientôt, Robert Staniland succombe à son tour au charme sulfureux de la jeune femme.

programme.title: Modern Murder : Parasomnie
programme.desc: Talia, une adolescente en proie à des visions, découvre le corps sans vie de Jürgen Bach, l'artisan qui rénovait la maison dans laquelle elle vit avec son père. La jeune fille a aperçu le meurtrier, et son témoignage devient incontournable pour faire avancer l'enquête des commissaires Winkler et Gorniak. Mais Talia a développé une autoprotection psychologique depuis la mort de sa mère sept ans auparavant et réprime ses visions horrifiques..

programme.title: The
Der Club der toten Mütter
programme.desc:
The (Dead Mothers) Club: Directed by Katie Green, Carlye Rubin. With Hope Edelman, Jane Fonda, Letitia Guimaraes-Lyle, Jordyn Levine. Three women bound by the shared experience of having lost their mothers during adolescence yet whose paths never cross." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2328773/","name":"The (Dead Mothers) Club","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3MzYzMzkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTgzMzU1MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three women bound by the shared experience of having lost their mothers during adolescence yet whose paths never cross.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2328773/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"StevePulaski"},"dateCreated":"2014-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"A bold opportunity showing loss and self-reflection (and a certain amount of self-motivation)","reviewBody":""It's like a club; you're initiated, you're in a club - it is not going away." - Rosie O'Donnell, The (Dead Mothers) Club.

The (Dead Mothers) Club premieres on HBO the day after Mother's Day in America, an airdate that is likely not a coincidence. I always rolled my eyes at all the "lonely" and "depressed" singles on Valentine's Day that would gripe about spending the day eating their hearts out or spending time in solidarity. Some people don't have mothers on Mother's Day, fathers on Father's Day, or grandparents on Grandparents Day, and you really want to blog about your issues with being single on a contrived day where elements of marketing and guilt dominate? Spare me.

The (Dead Mothers) Club is a documentary that will make you grateful to have your mother in your life or comforted through relatability by people who share your position if you don't. Despite headlining familiar names such as Jane Fonda, Rosie O'Donnell, and Molly Shannon, celebrities whose mothers died when they were all young, the film sets its main focus on common-people, one ready for college, another raising her young child, who have experienced tragedy with the lack of a female parental force to care for them.

One of the girls is Leticia, a clearly strong woman, whose mother died from a rare genetic mutation. Leticia is in the middle of raising a very young daughter when a test finds that she also had the rare mutation and that the flawed gene has spread throughout every cell in her body. She now has to put up the same fight her mother did and lost. Another girl we center on is Ginger, a wise, artistic young woman, who loves reflecting on her mother's personality and sensibilities. Her mother always worried because she was an art student that she'd never get the work she truly deserved. Ginger has found great success at painting and crafting stacking dolls and uses that as her means of income.

Finally, there's Jordyn, who is ready to enter college. A smart, beautiful young woman, she is definitely one of the most precocious teenage girls I've seen in a while, moved by legacy and persistency rather than impulsive behavior. She struggles to make the right decision about college without her mother's input.

Fonda, O'Donnell, and Shannon pop up every now and then to talk about their mother's impact and how their death affected them. Fonda's mom killed herself when she was twelve, and Fonda lived with that grief until she was sixty-four, when she realized it wasn't her fault after all. O'Donnell's mom died when she was ten, while Shannon's died in a car accident when she was only four.

Directresses Katie Green and Carlye Rubin refrain from milking sentimentality out of these stories, which is an element I've seen thankfully lacking in HBO documentaries. Despite films that bear titles and topics (IE: grief camps for children and a veteran in prison for life embracing his final days to name a few) that almost instantly make one tear up, these documentaries nicely avoid the sappier elements and exploiting certain situations emotionally.

It's often that I casually fault HBO's short documentaries for not being long enough and stating that many of them could easily be of feature length; The (Dead Mothers) Club, which runs at seventy minutes, give or take, could've easily been just as successful in its message with about thirty minutes trimmed off. The film begins to run circles around its ideas, and while we learn about the stories of the film's main characters, there's not much else we can say other than these are fine young women who are growing up without mothers and are likely going to make interesting, well-developed people. What about the young males who lack the female sensitivity and guidance in their lives? What about those who have become emotionally troubled without their mother in their life? 

If The (Dead Mothers) Club had to be seventy minutes in length, horizons could've been broadened and alternate routes could've been taken to give more thematic resonance to these stories other than having the audience recognize that they are indeed unfortunate. However, because it takes a necessary topic and fuels it was material and substance that isn't directly geared to exploit its subjects and the sentiment at hand, (and, in turn, winds up being very personal and often moving) the film does possess considerable merit.

NOTE: The (Dead Mothers) Club will air throughout the month of May 2014 on HBO.

Starring: Jane Fonda, Rosie O'Donnell, and Molly Shannon. IMDb data; ttnr: 2328773, Title: The, --- Description: The (Dead Mothers) Club: Directed by Katie Green, Carlye Rubin. With Hope Edelman, Jane Fonda, Letitia Guimaraes-Lyle, Jordyn Levine. Three women bound by the shared experience of having lost their mothers during adolescence yet whose paths never cross." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt2328773/","name":"The (Dead Mothers) Club","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTQ3MzYzMzkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwOTgzMzU1MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Three women bound by the shared experience of having lost their mothers during adolescence yet whose paths never cross.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt2328773/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"StevePulaski","dateCreated":"2014-05-15","inLanguage":"English","name":"A bold opportunity showing loss and self-reflection (and a certain amount of self-motivation)","reviewBody":""It's like a club; you're initiated, you're in a club - it is not going away." - Rosie O'Donnell, The (Dead Mothers) Club.

The (Dead Mothers) Club premieres on HBO the day after Mother's Day in America, an airdate that is likely not a coincidence. I always rolled my eyes at all the "lonely" and "depressed" singles on Valentine's Day that would gripe about spending the day eating their hearts out or spending time in solidarity. Some people don't have mothers on Mother's Day, fathers on Father's Day, or grandparents on Grandparents Day, and you really want to blog about your issues with being single on a contrived day where elements of marketing and guilt dominate? Spare me.

The (Dead Mothers) Club is a documentary that will make you grateful to have your mother in your life or comforted through relatability by people who share your position if you don't. Despite headlining familiar names such as Jane Fonda, Rosie O'Donnell, and Molly Shannon, celebrities whose mothers died when they were all young, the film sets its main focus on common-people, one ready for college, another raising her young child, who have experienced tragedy with the lack of a female parental force to care for them.

One of the girls is Leticia, a clearly strong woman, whose mother died from a rare genetic mutation. Leticia is in the middle of raising a very young daughter when a test finds that she also had the rare mutation and that the flawed gene has spread throughout every cell in her body. She now has to put up the same fight her mother did and lost. Another girl we center on is Ginger, a wise, artistic young woman, who loves reflecting on her mother's personality and sensibilities. Her mother always worried because she was an art student that she'd never get the work she truly deserved. Ginger has found great success at painting and crafting stacking dolls and uses that as her means of income.

Finally, there's Jordyn, who is ready to enter college. A smart, beautiful young woman, she is definitely one of the most precocious teenage girls I've seen in a while, moved by legacy and persistency rather than impulsive behavior. She struggles to make the right decision about college without her mother's input.

Fonda, O'Donnell, and Shannon pop up every now and then to talk about their mother's impact and how their death affected them. Fonda's mom killed herself when she was twelve, and Fonda lived with that grief until she was sixty-four, when she realized it wasn't her fault after all. O'Donnell's mom died when she was ten, while Shannon's died in a car accident when she was only four.

Directresses Katie Green and Carlye Rubin refrain from milking sentimentality out of these stories, which is an element I've seen thankfully lacking in HBO documentaries. Despite films that bear titles and topics (IE: grief camps for children and a veteran in prison for life embracing his final days to name a few) that almost instantly make one tear up, these documentaries nicely avoid the sappier elements and exploiting certain situations emotionally.

It's often that I casually fault HBO's short documentaries for not being long enough and stating that many of them could easily be of feature length; The (Dead Mothers) Club, which runs at seventy minutes, give or take, could've easily been just as successful in its message with about thirty minutes trimmed off. The film begins to run circles around its ideas, and while we learn about the stories of the film's main characters, there's not much else we can say other than these are fine young women who are growing up without mothers and are likely going to make interesting, well-developed people. What about the young males who lack the female sensitivity and guidance in their lives? What about those who have become emotionally troubled without their mother in their life? 

If The (Dead Mothers) Club had to be seventy minutes in length, horizons could've been broadened and alternate routes could've been taken to give more thematic resonance to these stories other than having the audience recognize that they are indeed unfortunate. However, because it takes a necessary topic and fuels it was material and substance that isn't directly geared to exploit its subjects and the sentiment at hand, (and, in turn, winds up being very personal and often moving) the film does possess considerable merit.

NOTE: The (Dead Mothers) Club will air throughout the month of May 2014 on HBO.

Starring: Jane Fonda, Rosie O'Donnell, and Molly Shannon. programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0809497, Title: Tell Me You Love Me, --- Description: Tell Me You Love Me: Created by Cynthia Mort. With Michelle Borth, Tim DeKay, Aislinn Paul, Adam Scott. A drama about three couples and the therapist they share." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0809497/","name":"Tell Me You Love Me","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThlNWY4MGYtNjQ4NS00NDEzLTg2MGMtNWZjOTU2NTM3Y2QzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about three couples and the therapist they share.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0809497/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blmcfarlane","dateCreated":"2007-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really new","reviewBody":"I like this a lot. Very new pace, daring way to go about telling stories. I am a big fan of this style,I think it is riveting and relevant to life, just my kind of thing. God I love to see sex that seems somewhat real. Good writing, true, insightful, fresh. GREAT ACTING!!! Ally Walker is brilliant, had these moment where I just sat with my mouth open, I knew exactly the inexpressible conflicting place she was at. All the choices were subtle, very right, exactly catching the moments of marriage and the pain. The pilot also was brilliantly directed, so quirky and confident. Not surprising coming from a woman who directed "I Heard the Mermaids Singing" Bravo Patricia! It is a show that seems to cash in on honest and patient Canadian integrity while remaining thoroughly entertaining. Note, give it more than 10 minutes before you decide it's not for you. Hope it manages to last- it is a bit risky, not what we're used to. Also, I'm not sure it will appeal to everyone, a little worrisome that I like it so much but I also am a big fan of Six Feet Under, Gray's Anatomy, House and Entourage (but I also liked John from Cincinatti) so who knows?","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3702,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-09-09","keywords":"love,sex scene,husband wife relationship,nudity,family relationships","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1218924/","name":"Michelle Borth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0215229/","name":"Tim DeKay","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1327832/","name":"Aislinn Paul"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0226614/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142539/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0607725/","name":"Cynthia Mort"]</script><metacontent="

A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion) 

7.5/10","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":7}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":391357,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.1},"contentRating":"G","genre":["Animation","Adventure","Comedy"],"datePublished":"2006-09-06","keywords":"car,car movie,route 66,truck,tow truck","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"How the Best Racing Films Raise the Stakes","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi365149977","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYjgwYTRjOTMtZWIwMy00Nzc2LWJiMDMtMDFkMjRhYTYwY2VmXkEyXkFqcGdeQWFsZWxvZw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"On this IMDbrief, sponsored by Coca-Cola, we're putting the pedal to the metal on the best racing films of all time."},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005562/","name":"Owen Wilson"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001372/","name":"Bonnie Hunt"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000056/","name":"Paul Newman"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0017902/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008970/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0005124/","name":"John Lasseter"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0710020/","name":"Joe Ranft"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0460146/","name":"Jorgen Klubien"}],"duration":"PT1H57M"}</script><metacontent="

A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman","dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion)

programme.sub-title: S1 E7 S1 E7 Brennende Leidenschaft
programme.desc: True Blood: Created by Alan Ball. With Anna Paquin, Stephen Moyer, Sam Trammell, Ryan Kwanten. Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

programme.review:
IMDb data; ttnr: 0248654, Title: Six Feet Under, --- Description: Six Feet Under: Created by Alan Ball. With Peter Krause, Michael C. Hall, Frances Conroy, Lauren Ambrose. A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0248654/","name":"Six Feet Under","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BN2FmMjg0Y2YtYmMyYi00MTBjLTllYzMtN2VjYzRhOTVmNWRlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNDIzMzcwNjc@._V1_.jpg","description":"A chronicle of the lives of a dysfunctional family who run an independent funeral home in Los Angeles.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0248654/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"stonedonkies","dateCreated":"2005-08-22","inLanguage":"English","name":"Raw, personal conflict was never so mesmerizing","reviewBody":"Six Feet Under is meticulous, beautiful, daunting, and powerful. One way or another, it will connect with you, perhaps in places you didn't expect and aren't willing to expose. At times wrenching, at other times cathartic, but always staring back at you knowingly, this show stands head and shoulders above the advertising-driven fare that clogs network TV with mediocrity, token minorities, and jarring commercial breaks. It changed the way I view television, and I recommend it to anyone who's tired of the same old crap.

After watching the series finale (which I won't spoil, don't worry), I sat in bed, unable to sleep. After poring over everything I'd seen over the past season, it struck me that SFU is the most raw and personal television show I've ever seen. Even more, there are no stand-alone episodes for easy syndication. Every single installment is part of a huge puzzle, or a few more miles on the Fisher family's road. I've always found Peter Krause to be a disappointingly flat performer, which is unfortunate because his character anchors the show, but the other actors are often transcendent. Regardless, every one of them radiates with a sometimes painfully familiar pathos. The cinematography is also staggering sometimes, taken from film rather than typical 3-camera TV work. If that's not enough, the music they choose to score the episodes is almost symbiotic; it seems ingrained into the film itself, even when you know it was just licensed.

This is not really a family-friendly show, though, encompassing profanity, nudity, violence, drug use, "alternative lifestyles" ... So in other words, it's just like real life. And despite the interpersonal conflicts that fuel the narrative to the point of melodrama, the show isn't afraid to pause every once in a while and let the show communicate without dialogue.

I feel very gratified to have watched SFU, and I've never felt that way about any other show in the almost-27 years I've been alive. Hopefully it will start a trend, if only on premium cable.","aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":128027,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":8.7,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Comedy","Drama"],"datePublished":"2001-06-03","keywords":"funeral home,daydream,talking to the dead,husband wife relationship,boyfriend girlfriend relationship","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0470244/","name":"Peter Krause","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0355910/","name":"Michael C. Hall","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0175814/","name":"Frances Conroy"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0010714/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0030266/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Six Feet Under: The Complete Second Season","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi2609381657","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNGM0ZmM3MDAtODc0MC00NjljLTk3OTEtNGM5MzYxOTA1ZDYwXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzU1NzE3NTg@._V1_.jpg","description":"Trailer"</script><metacontent="

The life and times of the woman who reformed the Russian empire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt7243884/","name":"Catherine the Great","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BZTI0ODk3YTEtODVlMS00ZmVlLThjOTYtYWZjOWFiOGRkZjBlXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"The life and times of the woman who reformed the Russian empire.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt7243884/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"linda-frances","dateCreated":"2019-10-03","inLanguage":"English","name":"Disappointing","reviewBody":"This drama starts late in the life of Catherine the Great, I would rather have seen more about her earlier life when she first married Peter and her rise to power. This seems to concentrate more on her sexual proclivities as an aging not particularly attractive despot.","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":5,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":4901,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.2,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Biography","Drama","History"],"datePublished":"2019-10-03","keywords":"catherine the great,hermitage,tsarina,female ruler,18th century","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000545/","name":"Helen Mirren","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0164809/","name":"Jason Clarke","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0571160/","name":"Gina McKee"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0237790/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0134223/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0022057/"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Official Trailer","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1520746265","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTkwZmRiN2UtODI0Yi00MzAyLTg4OTAtZTM4OGI3NWNlZDVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BYTkwZmRiN2UtODI0Yi00MzAyLTg4OTAtZTM4OGI3NWNlZDVkXkEyXkFqcGdeQXRyYW5zY29kZS13b3JrZmxvdw@@._V1_.jpg","description":"Oscar-winner Helen Mirren will lead miniseries Catherine the Great as the tumultuous monarch and politician who ruled the Russian empire and transformed its place in the world in the 18th century. The four-part historical drama will follow the end of Catherine’s reign and her affair with Russian military leader Grigory Potemkin that helped shape the future of Russian politics. Catherine the Great premieres October 21 at 10PM on HBO."</script><metacontent="

programme.title: Cinema Verite
Cinema Verite
programme.desc: Cinema Verite: Directed by Shari Springer Berman, Robert Pulcini. With Diane Lane, Tim Robbins, James Gandolfini, Thomas Dekker. A behind-the-scenes look at the making of the first American family to be the subjects of a reality TV show." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt1623742/","name":"Cinema Verite","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTMyNjU1MzE4Nl5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTcwNTU0MjgxNQ@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A behind-the-scenes look at the making of the first American family to be the subjects of a reality TV show.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt1623742/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"cosmo_tiger"},"dateCreated":"2012-03-06","inLanguage":"English","name":"An interesting and enjoyable look at the beginnings of reality TV. Great acting and great movie. I recommend this. I say A-","reviewBody":""One must never let the public behind the scenes for they are easily disillusioned and then they are angry with you, for it is the illusion they love." The first successful reality show was on PBS and it was about the Loud family. The show followed around Pat (Lane) and Bill (Robbins) Loud and their family. It was the first of it's kind and this movie about how it started, what it was like while it was going on and the aftermath. I was actually pretty excited about watching this because of the cast. I have to say I was not disappointed at all. The acting was great in this and the movie itself was very entertaining. I have never been a fan of reality TV but it was very interesting to see how the genre began and the immediate impact that the show had. I do have to say though that as great as this movie is and how interesting it was to see the family problems come to the surface I still have no interest to watch the real "American Family" show. That in no way means that I did not enjoy watching the Loud family in this movie though. Overall, an excellent movie that should be watched. Very, very interesting and makes me wonder how accurate it is. I give it an A-.","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":8}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3738,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":6.5},"contentRating":"TV-14","genre":["Drama"],"datePublished":"2011-04-23","keywords":"reference to the rolling stones,reference to mick jagger,reference to andy warhol,reference to joe namath,reference to richard nixon","trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Cinema Verite","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1027185945","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg5NzEwNDY3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODczNTUyMzE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BNTg5NzEwNDY3M15BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwODczNTUyMzE@._V1_.jpg","description":"A behind-the-scenes look at the making of the first American family to be the subjects of a reality TV show. "},"actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000178/","name":"Diane Lane"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0000209/","name":"Tim Robbins"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001254/","name":"James Gandolfini"}],"director":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0075849/","name":"Shari Springer Berman"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0700301/","name":"Robert Pulcini"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0005861/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142539/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0783544/","name":"David Seltzer"}],"duration":"PT1H26M"}</script><metacontent="

programme.review: IMDb data; ttnr: 0809497, Title: Tell Me You Love Me, --- Description: Tell Me You Love Me: Created by Cynthia Mort. With Michelle Borth, Tim DeKay, Aislinn Paul, Adam Scott. A drama about three couples and the therapist they share." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0809497/","name":"Tell Me You Love Me","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOThlNWY4MGYtNjQ4NS00NDEzLTg2MGMtNWZjOTU2NTM3Y2QzXkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNTE1NjY5Mg@@._V1_.jpg","description":"A drama about three couples and the therapist they share.","review":"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0809497/","author":"@type":"Person","name":"blmcfarlane","dateCreated":"2007-09-11","inLanguage":"English","name":"Really new","reviewBody":"I like this a lot. Very new pace, daring way to go about telling stories. I am a big fan of this style,I think it is riveting and relevant to life, just my kind of thing. God I love to see sex that seems somewhat real. Good writing, true, insightful, fresh. GREAT ACTING!!! Ally Walker is brilliant, had these moment where I just sat with my mouth open, I knew exactly the inexpressible conflicting place she was at. All the choices were subtle, very right, exactly catching the moments of marriage and the pain. The pilot also was brilliantly directed, so quirky and confident. Not surprising coming from a woman who directed "I Heard the Mermaids Singing" Bravo Patricia! It is a show that seems to cash in on honest and patient Canadian integrity while remaining thoroughly entertaining. Note, give it more than 10 minutes before you decide it's not for you. Hope it manages to last- it is a bit risky, not what we're used to. Also, I'm not sure it will appeal to everyone, a little worrisome that I like it so much but I also am a big fan of Six Feet Under, Gray's Anatomy, House and Entourage (but I also liked John from Cincinatti) so who knows?","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":9,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":3702,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.3,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Romance"],"datePublished":"2007-09-09","keywords":"love,sex scene,husband wife relationship,nudity,family relationships","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1218924/","name":"Michelle Borth","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0215229/","name":"Tim DeKay","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm1327832/","name":"Aislinn Paul"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0226614/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0142539/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0607725/","name":"Cynthia Mort"]</script><metacontent="

A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"Movie","url":"/title/tt0317219/","name":"Cars","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMTg5NzY0MzA2MV5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTYwNDc3NTc2._V1_.jpg","description":"A hot-shot race-car named Lightning McQueen gets waylaid in Radiator Springs, where he finds the true meaning of friendship and family.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0317219/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"Rectangular_businessman"},"dateCreated":"2007-01-14","inLanguage":"English","name":"Pixar keep the good line","reviewBody":"I found this movie to be enjoyable enough: Even when it is true that it wasn't at the same level than some of previous Pixar films (Such as "Toy Story" and "The Incredibles") it was a good film anyway, with an entertaining story and likable characters.

Despite the strangeness of the premise of a world inhabited by living cars, the execution is fairly convincing, with a neat character development and many funny and heartwarming moments.

Without being perfect, it managed to be something totally worth-watching from beginning to end, and in many ways this could be easily considered one of the best animated films from the year 2006 (Which was a terrible year, in my opinion)

Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire." data-id="main"/><script type="application/ld+json">{"@context":"https://schema.org","@type":"TVSeries","url":"/title/tt0844441/","name":"True Blood","image":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BMDVjZDQ2N2MtMzMxYy00ZjliLTg5YjAtNjk1OTUwYjVjNWQ0XkEyXkFqcGdeQXVyNzA5NjUyNjM@._V1_.jpg","description":"Telepathic waitress Sookie Stackhouse encounters a strange new supernatural world when she meets the mysterious Bill Compton, a southern Louisiana gentleman and vampire.","review":{"@type":"Review","itemReviewed":{"@type":"CreativeWork","url":"/title/tt0844441/"},"author":{"@type":"Person","name":"skip-98756"},"dateCreated":"2020-05-23","inLanguage":"English","name":"Absolutely Superb and Unique Entry in this Genre!","reviewBody":"I just finished watching this amazing vampire series once again..I saw it when it 1st came out and hadnt watched it for a long time..I'd forgotton how it ended and alot of it was like watching for the first time again. This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":{"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10}},"aggregateRating":{"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8},"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":[{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"}],"creator":[{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/"},{"@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/"},{"@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"}],"trailer":{"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":{"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg"},"thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."}}</script><metacontent="

This is some Very unique writing and not like any vampire,werewolf,witch show that you have ever seen before..It takes the very difficult path of mixing horror,gore,sexuality, intensity, drama,humor and satire all in one show and it does it extremely well! You feel a bond with each of the characters and there is a great deal of character development over the seasons, so much so that some of the characters become almost polar opposites of what they were when they were 1st introduced..Another fascinating twist is the Bizzare but also Wonderful change in the writing that occurs in the last season..its So Different that you wonder what the heck happenned! The whole tone of the show changes and yes this will disrupt Alot of viewers who expect a continuity of theme thru the show till its end....But....The change ,though radical, is also wonderful..I'd say there is Less humor, less satire, more Intensity, More seriousness in each actors acting which leads to a more dramatic feeling..The gore is still there but its Not as funny, its serious, its intense, and its heart breaking for so many of the characters and they all act it out so well.. Overall, that last season was like watching a Different show but it was Every bit as interesting and entertaining...Now thats something you Dont see very often! I love this show...Sexy,smart, dramatic, satirical and crazy funny at time, heartbreaking at others...What more could you ask of Any show in Any genre? The Final episode covers the full gamut of emotions and wraps things up in a beautiful ending that would bring a tear and a smile to anyone... highly recommended!","reviewRating":"@type":"Rating","worstRating":1,"bestRating":10,"ratingValue":10,"aggregateRating":"@type":"AggregateRating","ratingCount":236826,"bestRating":10,"worstRating":1,"ratingValue":7.8,"contentRating":"TV-MA","genre":["Drama","Fantasy","Mystery"],"datePublished":"2008-09-07","keywords":"human vampire relationship,vampire,witch,shapeshifter,bare breasts","actor":["@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0001593/","name":"Anna Paquin","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0610459/","name":"Stephen Moyer","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0870794/","name":"Sam Trammell"],"creator":["@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0247237/","@type":"Organization","url":"/company/co0008693/","@type":"Person","url":"/name/nm0050332/","name":"Alan Ball"],"trailer":"@type":"VideoObject","name":"Season 7","embedUrl":"/video/imdb/vi1494920473","thumbnail":"@type":"ImageObject","contentUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","thumbnailUrl":"https://m.media-amazon.com/images/M/MV5BOTgyNDcxMDkwOF5BMl5BanBnXkFtZTgwMDY4MjM4MTE@._V1_.jpg","description":"Watch the full trailer for HBO's original series "True Blood"."</script><metacontent="

As everybody episode goes by the show only becomes more addictive. It taps into almost every aspect of life. Every emotion is shown; love, hate, forgiveness, triumph and the list goes on and on. In fact this show depicts life the most realistically. The strangeness and peculiarity of the many themes perfectly displays the confusion in life and how it affects us. The show displays confusion in the clearest way making it almost impossible not to some how relate to the characters in the show. Not to mention also the series ends on one finest note you will ever see not just satisfying the viewer but taking the show to a level far and above anything else I have ever seen before.
